// API surface inspired by Mocha,
// Copyright (c) TJ Holowaychuk <tj@vision-media.ca>
//
// Using these functions still outputs TAP, of course.
var stack = require('./stack.js')
 
exports.it = it
exports.describe = describe
exports.global = function () {
  for (var g in exports)
    global[g] = exports[g]
}
 
var t = require('./root.js')
 
function it (name, fn) {
  var c = t.current()
  var at = stack.at(it)
 
  if (fn && fn.length)
    c.test(name, { at: at }, function (tt) {
      fn(function () {
        tt.end()
      })
    })
  else
    c.doesNotThrow(fn, name || 'unnamed test', { at: at })
}
 
function describe (name, fn) {
  var c = t.current()
  var at = stack.at(describe)
  if (!fn)
    c.test(name, { at: at })
  else if (fn.length)
    c.test(name, { at: at }, function (tt) {
      fn(function () {
        tt.end()
      })
    })
  else
    c.test(name, { at: at }, function (tt) {
      fn()
      tt.end()
    })
}
 
Generated by istanbul at Sat May 23 2015 22:34:34 GMT-0700 (PDT)
